p: Studies included in the present review suggested that different medicinal cannabinoids at distinct doses and formulations could represent promising treatment strategies for PTSD-related symptoms, also presenting an impact on the quality of life in this population. Particularly, not only did treatment with cannabinoids determine an overall improvement of PTSD symptomatology [ 37, 39, 40, 47, 48, 49, 51], but it also influenced specific symptom domains, namely sleep disorders [ 37, 38, 39], arousal disturbances [ 37], and suicidal thoughts [ 48]. Noteworthy, a significant reduction of pain [ 48, 51] and social impact [ 48], as well as an improvement in quality of life and well-being [ 39, 51], were demonstrated.
